dmca.title: DMCA Abuse artmasters.com.br
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, May 13, 2007 5:04 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4070736O] DMCA Abuse artmasters.com.br ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Abuse artmasters.com.br Added by system at Sunday, May 13 2007 10:03 am X-MailFrom: support@gpf-design.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun, 13 May 2007 10:03:03 -0500 From: "DjiXas" To: Cc: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Abuse artmasters.com.br Subject: DMCA Abuse artmasters.com.br Date: Sun, 13 May 2007 18:03:09 +0300 Message-ID: <028201c7956f$d44ccd20$7ce66760$@com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0283_01C79588.F99A0520" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 12.0 Thread-Index: AceVb9DtdZwEnE2OQNuwiSzrR42NoA== Content-Language: lt X-PopBeforeSMTPSenders: admin@2-software.net,admin@bizmajors.com,advertising@getpaidforum.net,ad vertising@media-files.net,bizdev@bizmajors.com,bizdev@flashbacksearch.co m,msn@bizmajors.com,payment@bizmajors.com,sales@autosurf-script.com,stuf f@proxyping.com,support@autosurf-script.com,support@bizmajors.com,suppor t@dbfuck.com,support@flashbacksearch.com,support@gpf-design.com,support@ media-files.net,support@proxyping.com,theking@getpaidforum.net X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - server89.bizmajors.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - gpf-design.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: support@gpf-design.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 May 2007 15:03:19.0396 (UTC) FILETIME=[D7928240:01C7956F] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multipart message in MIME format. (multipart/related) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Date: May 13, 2007 Contact Information Recipient Information The Planet 835 Greens Parkway, Suite 150 Houston , Texas 77067 Email: abuse@ev1servers.net, copyright@theplanet.com Phone: 866-325-0045 Fax: 713-942-8621 Sent via: Email Sender Information GPF-Design.com Attn: Vygantas Lipskas R.Kalantos 171-13 Kaunas, N/A 52326 Email: support@gpf-design.com (+370) 6015-7877 DMCA Rules (http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/z?c105:H.R.2281.ENR:) Signature: signature Delivery: Email To Whom It May Concern: The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that allegedly infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter. Be aware that if you ignore this notice, you (as a Provider covered by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act) forfeit the Act's immunity from monetary damages, which range from $750 to $30,000 per work infringed and up to $150,000 per work for willful infringement. Attorney's fees and costs can also be recovered. What you (the Provider) need to do now: 1) Reply to the Complainant (Us) and/or the Authorized Agent thereof that this notification has been received, within 24 hours. 2) Send your customer written notification, along with a copy of this notification, requesting removal of the infringing material and requiring confirmation of the removal be sent to you (the Provider) within 24 hours; 3) Disable access to the infringing material or the customer's account if the customer fails to remove the infringing material and/or fails to inform you (the Provider) of the removal within 24 hours of notification; 4) Send the Complainant (Us) and /or the Authorized Agent thereof notice of the customer's counter notification and your (the Provider) intent to re-enable access to the material or the account within 14 days of your (the Providers) receipt of any customer counter notification, assuming the counter notification meets the requirements of the DMCA Act. Identification of Copyrighted Work The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on www.gpf-design.com and its related pages. The pages in question contain a clear copyright notification and are the intellectual property of the complainant. Identification of Infringed Material The following copyrighted paragraphs have been allegedly copied from the copyrighted work. We have retained but not submitted printed examples of these and other alleged infringements. Be aware that these are blatant and obvious examples and are not necessarily a complete list of all alleged violations. We require that all alleged copyright violations be removed from the website in question and the onus is on the infringer to locate and remove all alleged copyright violations of the complainant's intellectual property. Be further aware that simply making a few changes (such as changing a name or rewording or reformatting some text) is not sufficient to remove the rights of the complainant. The alleged offending materials (or website) must be wholly removed. Website: www.artmasters.com.br Original Paragraph: We are specialized designers team providing Invision Power Board and vBulletin forum systems skins. Skins are free to use as long as there are our copyright placed. http://www.gpf-design.com/download Copyright Violation: Before downloading each skin, downloader has to accept terms. These skins are free to be used on any Invision Power Board software. You may modify them to suit your needs. To remove links in the footer, you need to purchase copyright removal in e-shop, otherwise it is NOT allowed to modify or remove our copyright in any case. As you can see at eaxposed.com, they have removed our copyright in the footer without purchasing copyright removal. GPF-Design.com Attn: Vygantas Lipskas R.Kalantos 171-13 Kaunas, N/A 52326 Lithuania Email: support@gpf-design.com (+370) 6015-7877 Copyright Infringers Whois Information Registrant: LUGBR3 Luis Guilherme Brunck Administrative Contact: LUGBR3 Luis Guilherme Brunck Technical Contact: LUGBR3 Luis Guilherme Brunck I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Signed on this day, the 13'Th day of April, 2007, Vygantas Lipskas signature Have a Nice Day. Best Regards, Vygantas L. - DjiXas MIME element (text/html)

DMCA Rules (http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/z?c105:H.R.2281.ENR:)

Signature:

Delivery: Email

 

To Whom It May Concern:

The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that allegedly infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter.

Be aware that if you ignore this notice, you (as a Provider covered by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act) forfeit the Act's immunity from monetary damages, which range from $750 to $30,000 per work infringed and up to $150,000 per work for willful infringement. Attorney's fees and costs can also be recovered.

 

 

 

What you (the Provider) need to do now:

1) Reply to the Complainant (Us) and/or the Authorized Agent thereof that this notification has been received, within 24 hours.

2) Send your customer written notification, along with a copy of this notification, requesting removal of the infringing material and requiring confirmation of the removal be sent to you (the Provider) within 24 hours;

3) Disable access to the infringing material or the customer's account if the customer fails to remove the infringing material and/or fails to inform you (the Provider) of the removal within 24 hours of notification;

4) Send the Complainant (Us) and /or the Authorized Agent thereof notice of the customer's counter notification and your (the Provider) intent to re-enable access to the material or the account within 14 days of your (the Providers) receipt of any customer counter notification, assuming the counter notification meets the requirements of the DMCA Act.

Identification of Copyrighted Work

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on www.gpf-design.com and its related pages. The pages in question contain a clear copyright notification and are the intellectual property of the complainant.

Identification of Infringed Material

The following copyrighted paragraphs have been allegedly copied from the copyrighted work. We have retained but not submitted printed examples of these and other alleged infringements.

Be aware that these are blatant and obvious examples and are not necessarily a complete list of all alleged violations. We require that all alleged copyright violations be removed from the website in question and the onus is on the infringer to locate and remove all alleged copyright violations of the complainant’s intellectual property.

Be further aware that simply making a few changes (such as changing a name or rewording or reformatting some text) is not sufficient to remove the rights of the complainant. The alleged offending materials (or website) must be wholly removed.

 

 

Website: www.artmasters.com.br

 

Original Paragraph:

 

We are specialized designers team providing
Invision Power Board and vBulletin forum systems skins. Skins are free
to use as long as there are our copyright
placed.

 

http://www.gpf-design.com/down load

 

Copyright Violation:

 

Before downloading each skin, downloader has to
accept terms.
 
These
skins are free to be used on any Invision Power Board software. You may
modify them to suit your needs. To remove links in the footer, you need
to purchase copyright removal in e-shop, otherwise it is NOT allowed to
modify or remove our copyright in any case.

 

As you can see at eaxposed.com, they have removed our copyright in the footer without purchasing copyright removal.

 

GPF-Design.com
Attn: Vygantas Lipskas
R.Kalantos 171-13
Kaunas, N/A 52326

Lithuania

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed on this day, the 13’Th day of April, 2007,

Have a Nice Day.

 

Best Regards,
Vygantas L. - DjiXas
